content.text:
# San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards 2016

15th SFFCC Awards
December 11, 2016
----
Picture:
Moonlight
----
Animated Feature:
The Red Turtle
----
Documentary:
I Am Not Your Negro
----
Foreign Language Picture:
The Handmaiden
The 15th San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards, honoring the best in film for 2016, were given on December 11, 2016.
Winners
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
These are the nominees for the 15th SFFCC Awards. Winners are listed at the top of each list:
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
!style="width=50%" | Best Film
!style="width=50%" | Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
* Moonlight
** Arrival
** Hell or High Water
** La La Land
** Manchester by the Sea
| valign="top" |
* 'Barry Jenkins – Moonlight'
** Damien Chazelle – La La Land
** Kenneth Lonergan – Manchester by the Sea
** Jeff Nichols – Loving
** Denis Villeneuve – Arrival
|-
!style="width=50%" | Best Actor
!style="width=50%" | Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Denzel Washington – Fences'
** Casey Affleck – Manchester by the Sea
** Joel Edgerton – Loving
** Ryan Gosling – La La Land
** Tom Hanks – Sully
| valign="top" |
* 'Isabelle Huppert – Elle'
** Amy Adams – Arrival
** Annette Bening – 20th Century Women
** Ruth Negga – Loving
** Natalie Portman – Jackie
|-
!style="width=50%" | Best Supporting Actor
!style="width=50%" | Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Mahershala Ali – Moonlight'
** Jeff Bridges – Hell or High Water
** Ralph Fiennes – A Bigger Splash
** Ben Foster – Hell or High Water
** Michael Shannon – Nocturnal Animals
| valign="top" |
* 'Viola Davis – Fences'
** Greta Gerwig – 20th Century Women
** Lily Gladstone – Certain Women
** Naomie Harris – Moonlight
** Michelle Williams – Manchester by the Sea
|-
!style="width=50%" | Best Screenplay – Adapted
!style="width=50%" | Best Screenplay – Original
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Eric Heisserer – Arrival'
** David Birke – Elle
** Park Chan-wook and Chung Seo-kyung – The Handmaiden
** Tom Ford – Nocturnal Animals
** August Wilson – Fences
| valign="top" |
* 'Barry Jenkins – Moonlight (TIE)
* Kenneth Lonergan – Manchester by the Sea (TIE)'
** Damien Chazelle – La La Land
** Yorgos Lanthimos and Efthimis Filippou – The Lobster
** Taylor Sheridan – Hell or High Water
|-

** Finding Dory

| valign="top" |

** 13th
** Cameraperson
** Fire at Sea
** O.J.: Made in America
|-

!style="width=50%" | Best Cinematography
|-

** Elle
** Neruda
** The Salesman
** Toni Erdmann
| valign="top" |
* 'James Laxton – Moonlight'
** Stéphane Fontaine – Jackie
** Rodrigo Prieto – Silence
** Linus Sandgren – La La Land
** Bradford Young – Arrival
|-

|-

Special awards
Special Citation Award for under-appreciated independent cinema
* The Fits
Marlon Riggs Award for courage & vision in the Bay Area film community
* Joshua Grannell (a.k.a. Peaches Christ)
